Title: Relates to the ability of a fare-paying passenger in a vehicle for hire to consent to sexual activity inside such vehicle with the operator of the vehicle
Summary: Relates to the ability of a fare-paying passenger in a vehicle for hire to consent to sexual activity inside the vehicle with the operator of the vehicle.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the ability of a fare-paying passenger in a vehicle for hire to consent to sexual activity inside the vehicle with the operator of the vehicle
